author: Special Correspondent
text:
THENI

J.A. College for Women: 45{+t}{+h}College Day celebrations, Mother Teresa University Vice-Chancellor G. Valli, chief guest, Joachi Auditorium, College premises, Periyakulam, 11 a.m.

SIVAKASI

Mepco Schlenk Engineering College: Jeyakesavan Veerasamy, Director, Centre for Computer Science Education and Outreach, University of Texas, speaks on “10 ways to make learning programming enjoyable” and “learning CS concepts through real life analogies;” S. Arivazhagan, Principal, presides, Mechanical Engineering Block, 9.15 a.m.

KARAIKUDI

Dr. Umayal Ramanathan College for Women: NSS camp, Sankarapuram, 10 a.m.

Vivekananda Institute of Technology: Inauguration by Sundari, Principal, Sarada Vidyalaya Matriculation School; SP. Singaram, chairman, Vivekananda Community College, addresses; PR. Senthilnathan, MP, presides, College Road, 10.30 a.m.

RAMANATHAPURAM

Syed Ammal Engineering College: Workshop on ‘SPSS and Tally;’ Sairam and Jayabalan address, Kabir, Director, presides, MBA Department, 10 a.m.

RAMESWARAM

Ramanathaswamy Temple: Mahasivaratri festival; procession of deity, 7 p.m.

BATLAGUNDU

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Annai Velankanni Matriculation School, Madurai Road, 6 p.m.
title: Dindigul engagements
